nodes.text: Gthyk was a female Chiss who served in the Chiss Expansionary Defense Force in cooperation with the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Galactic War, she was stationed at Dorn Base on the planet Hoth, where she operated the small cantina there.
Gthyk appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Cantina Vendor for Imperial players on Hoth.
